answers.answer: My doctor told me the sooner they flip around the better because then you don't have to worry about them not doing it. And you still have a while to go! Who knows the baby could just be doing cartwheels:) my little guy switched to all kinds of positions before he finally stayed head down.

I am 28w5d and last week I could tell my baby flipped head down bc she was sitting lower and was having lots of new pressure I went for an Ultrasound Tuesday and I was right she did flip. So yes its very possible.  My other 2 kods were not so easy my daughter was breached n had to do a csection and my son was laying transverse (side to side) n he was a second csection.. My doc wanted to try a VBac due to this baby cooperating but now I've had high blood pressure thinks im developing preeclampsia again so this will be my third csection in Jan.

question: I'm 27 weeks with my 4th. I feel like she has dropped. Lots of new pressure. Belly looks lower too. Is it possible? She's always been on the low side. It also feels like she may have already switched to head down. It's been almost 7 years since I've done this so I'm curious what you ask think.
title: Baby dropping
